mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT usr.user_id, rol.access_menu_code, cd.code, cd.code_name, cd.code_val FROM ciams_access_user_link usr INNER JOIN ciams_access_role_link rol ON usr.access_role_code = rol.access_role_code INNER JOIN ciams_code cd ON rol.access_menu_code = cd.code WHERE usr.user_id = #{loginId}
